name: sqlpm
description: Contains sql package manager (sqlpm) and re-usable database schema.
keywords: Typescript, SQL, SQL DDL, package manager, database schema, re-usable DDL, SQL Versioning

scripts.test:integration: set -o allexport; source .env; source .env.local; yarn build && jest --config=./jest.integration.config.ts
scripts.test:integration:watch: set -o allexport; source .env; source .env.local; yarn build && jest --config=./jest.integration.config.ts --watch --coverage --verbose
scripts.publish:all: yarn test:integration && yarn build && yarn lerna publish
scripts.docker:up: set -o allexport; source .env; source .env.local; set +o allexport; docker compose -f docker-compose.yml up
scripts.docker:down: set -o allexport; source .env; source .env.local; set +o allexport; docker compose -f docker-compose.yml down
scripts.docker:build: set -o allexport; source .env; source .env.local; set +o allexport; docker compose -f docker-compose.yml build
scripts.docker:destroy: yarn docker:down ; docker rmi $(docker images --filter "reference=sqlpm*" -q) -f; docker volume rm sqlpm_sqlpm_testing_db_data
scripts.tsc: echo "You probably don't want to run tsc at the root of this mono-repo. It creates maps and types for every ts file!"
